DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess clinical significance supranormal differential renal function ( DRF ) recovery unilateral hydronephrosis ( HN ) surgery , pediatric patient underwent pyeloplasty ureteropelvic junction obstruction ( UPJO ) show supranormal DRF ( > 55 % ) DTPA renography analyze .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Significance Supranormal Differential Renal Function Recovery Hydronephrosis
DOC.detailed_description: To assess clinical significance supranormal differential renal function ( DRF ) recovery unilateral hydronephrosis ( HN ) surgery , pediatric patient underwent pyeloplasty ureteropelvic junction obstruction ( UPJO ) show supranormal DRF ( > 55 % ) DTPA renography analyze . Clinical parameter include age first visit , age operation , gender , laterality , follow-up period evaluate . To evaluate predictor recovery supranormal renal function accord level DRF , univariate multivariate logistic regression analysis perform . Patients would subcategorized two group ; group A ( DRF â‰¤60 % ) group B ( DRF > 60 % ) consideration mean value preoperative DRF parameter group A compare group B use independent sample 's test chi square test . Kaplan-Meier analysis log-rank test use determine difference recovery time obstruct hydronephrosis parameter .
DOC.criteria: ureteropelvic junction obstruction hydronephrosis differential renal function 55 % DTPA followup period 1 year urological anomaly , vesicoureteral reflux , ureterocele , cystic kidney disease , posterior urethral valve , duplex anomaly , neurogenic bladder , solitary kidney patient underwent previous urological surgery
DOC.keyword: Patients unilateral UPJO patient preop HN USG supranormal renal function DTPA renography
